column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
Yeah, make me kind of more calm and relaxed with regard to that topic.

To help you feel calmer and more relaxed, I recommend engaging in mindfulness activities such as deep breathing, meditation, or yoga. Additionally, speaking to a therapist or counselor can help you manage your emotions and reduce stress.
